abstract: A solar cell and module maker Advent Solar, said on Tuesday it had secured more than $70 million in a series D funding to ramp up production at its four-month old production facility.
lead_paragraph: A solar cell and module maker Advent Solar, said on Tuesday it had secured more than $70 million in a series D funding to ramp up production at its four-month old production facility.

headline.main: V.C.’s Shower Advent Solar With Cash
